title: $:/plugins/tg/iframe-button
author: TonGerner
name: Iframe button
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html"/> A button (<> ) for the Editor toolbar that applies an iframe to the selected url
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/iframe}} <<< ''Note:''
The full iframe code `` is used here.
So - if required - it can be adpted per tiddler. <<<
